sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements unpack.

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element archive is used to specify the archive in an unpack operation.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.programlisting: echo Unpacking /usr/src/lfs-packages/gzip.1.2.4a.tar.gz into /usr/src cd /usr/src tar xzvf /usr/src/lfs-packages/gzip.1.2.4a.tar.gz
